Package org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl

Class AbstractLTLRewriter

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.ltl.AbstractLTLRewriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
LTLRewriter
Direct Known Subclasses:
LTLRewriterAdapter
public abstract class AbstractLTLRewriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements LTLRewriter
This class provides a default implementation of LTLRewriter. This rewriter rewrites LTL formulae recursively in a depth-first manner.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
